q1.name: Stretching Strikes
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Zac''' stretches his left arm in the target direction that catches the first enemy it hits, dealing them {{as|magic damage}}, {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 40% for {{fd|0.5}} seconds, and forming a {{tip|tether}} between '''Zac''' and the target for 2 seconds, during which the target is {{tip|true sight|revealed}}.

While the tether persists, '''Zac's''' next [[basic attack]] is replaced by a second ''Stretching Strike'', empowering it to have a {{fd|0.25}}-second cast time, gain {{sti|25 '''bonus''' attack range}}, deal the same {{as|magic damage}} and apply the same {{tip|slow}}. This attack cannot {{tip|critically strike}}.

If the two ''Stretching Strikes'' affect different targets, both targets are {{tip|root|rooted}} for {{tt|{{fd|0.5}}|Estimated}} seconds and receive the same {{tip|slow}} and, after a {{tt|{{fd|0.4}}-second delay|After the attack's cast time}}, '''Zac''' {{tt|displaces|Only move block, does not stun the target's actions (disables attacking and movement only)}} them towards each other for 300 range.

If the two targets are {{tt|near|700 range}} each other, they're slammed against each other instead of toward each other via the displacement, both additionally taking the initial {{as|magic damage}} again and becoming {{tip|airborne|knocked up}} and {{tip|stun|stunned}} for {{fd|0.25}} seconds upon impact with each other.
Both ''Stretching Strikes'', the cast and the empowered attack, {{tip|basic attack reset|reset}} '''Zac's''' basic attack timer.
q1.descriptionHtml: Active: Zac stretches his left arm in the target direction that catches the first enemy it hits, dealing them magic damage, slowing them by 40% for 0.5 seconds, and forming a tether between Zac and the target for 2 seconds, during which the target is revealed.While the tether persists, Zac's next basic attack is replaced by a second Stretching Strike, empowering it to have a 0.25-second cast time, gain 25 bonus attack range, deal the same magic damage and apply the same slow. This attack cannot critically strike.If the two Stretching Strikes affect different targets, both targets are rooted for 0.5 seconds and receive the same slow and, after a 0.4-second delay, Zac displaces them towards each other for 300 range.If the two targets are near each other, they're slammed against each other instead of toward each other via the displacement, both additionally taking the initial magic damage again and becoming knocked up and stunned for 0.25 seconds upon impact with each other.Both Stretching Strikes, the cast and the empowered attack, reset Zac's basic attack timer.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|40 to 100}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}} {{as|(+ {{fd|2.5}}% of '''Zac's''' '''maximum''' health)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|40*2 to 100*2}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}} {{as|(+ 5% of '''Zac's''' '''maximum''' health)}}}}
q1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} will block a single instance of damage only.
* If the tethered target is {{tip|untargetable}} during the second ''Stretching Strike'' via basic attack, they are completely unaffected by the ability.
* {{Pending for test}}: Parry interactions ({{tip|dodge}}, {{tip|block}}, {{tip|blind}}).
q1.cost_warn: Wiki's and Riot's mana costs do not match: Wiki's value  {{as|8%|health}} as 8 and riot's value 0,0,0,0,0 as 0

w1.name: Unstable Matter
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Zac's''' body explodes outward, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies, capped against {{tip|minions}} and {{tip|monsters}}.
'''Zac''' grants {{tip|ghost|ghosting}} to monsters hit for 5 seconds.
''Unstable Matter's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is reduced by 1 second every time '''Zac''' picks up a {{ai|Cell Division|Zac}} chunk.
w1.descriptionHtml: Active: Zac's body explodes outward, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies, capped against minions and monsters.Zac grants ghosting to monsters hit for 5 seconds.Unstable Matter's cooldown is reduced by 1 second every time Zac picks up a Cell Division chunk.

e1.name: Elastic Slingshot
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Zac''' {{tip|channel|charges}} for up to {{fd|4.5}} seconds, increasing ''Elastic Slingshot's'' {{sti|range}} over a cone in the target direction. ''Elastic Slingshot'' can be recast at any time within its duration.

If '''Zac''' {{tt|cancels the channel|Details below}} himself, or the charge completes without reactivation, 50% of ''Elastic Slingshot's'' {{sti|{{as|health cost}}}} and {{sti|cooldown}} are refunded.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Zac''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target location, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies on impact and {{tip|airborne|knocking them up}} and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for {{fd|0.5}} seconds, increased to 1 second if ''Elastic Slingshot'' was charged for more than 1 second.
e1.descriptionHtml: Active: Zac charges for up to 4.5 seconds, increasing Elastic Slingshot's range over a cone in the target direction. Elastic Slingshot can be recast at any time within its duration.If Zac cancels the channel himself, or the charge completes without reactivation, 50% of Elastic Slingshot's health cost and cooldown are refunded.Recast: Zac dashes to the target location, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies on impact and knocking them up and stunning them for 0.5 seconds, increased to 1 second if Elastic Slingshot was charged for more than 1 second.
e1.cost_warn: Wiki's and Riot's mana costs do not match: Wiki's value  {{as|4%|health}} as 4 and riot's value 0,0,0,0,0 as 0

r1.name: Let's Bounce!
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Zac''' bounces 4 times over 3 seconds, gaining {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|7|type=duration|key=%|20 to 50|0 to 3}} {{sti|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, but becoming unable to declare basic attacks and use {{ai|Stretching Strikes|Zac}} and {{ai|Elastic Slingshot|Zac}} for the duration. There is a 1-second delay between each bounce.
Each bounce deals {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies, {{tip|airborne|knocking them back}} over 1 second and subsequently {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 20% for the same duration.
Enemies can be damaged by multiple bounces, with each one beyond the first dealing 50% damage but not {{tip|airborne|displacing}} them.
r1.descriptionHtml: Passive: Increases Cell Division's healing from chunks.Active: Zac bounces 4 times over 3 seconds, gaining Unknown value: passive progression/deprecated version 7 type=duration key=% 20 to 50 0 to 3 bonus movement speed, but becoming unable to declare basic attacks and use Stretching Strikes and Elastic Slingshot for the duration. There is a 1-second delay between each bounce.Each bounce deals magic damage to all nearby enemies, knocking them back over 1 second and subsequently slowing them by 20% for the same duration.Enemies can be damaged by multiple bounces, with each one beyond the first dealing 50% damage but not displacing them.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|140 to 280}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}|Reduced Damage|{{ap|140/2 to 280/2}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}}|Maximum Single-Target Damage|{{ap|140*2.5 to 280*2.5}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}}}}
r1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield}} only blocks a single instance of damage.
* Entering {{tip|stasis}} will end ''Let's Bounce!'' prematurely.
